title: Interviews RAG
description: RAG Actor for querying meeting notes. Configuration is loaded from environment variables (OPENAI_API_KEY, PINECONE_API_KEY, INDEX_NAME). HTTP requests only need to provide the question.

question.title: Question
question.description: Your question about the meeting notes/interviews. Provide via HTTP POST to /query endpoint.

k.title: Top K Results
k.description: Number of documents to retrieve (1-50). Optional per-request override.

threshold.title: Similarity Threshold
threshold.description: Minimum similarity score for retrieved documents (0.0-1.0). Optional per-request override.

recency_weight.title: Recency Weight
recency_weight.description: How much to favor recent documents (0.0 = only similarity, 1.0 = only recency). Optional per-request override.

recency_decay_days.title: Recency Decay (Days)
recency_decay_days.description: Half-life for recency scoring. Optional per-request override.

start_template.title: System Prompt
start_template.description: Instructions for how the AI should respond. Optional per-request override.
start_template.default: Answer the question based on the context provided.
